value.title: How to run ASP.NET apps on Windows or Linux | One Dev Question: Laurent Bugnion
value.excerpt: In the One Dev Question series, Cloud Developer Advocate Laurent Bugnion explains various development features of Azure. In this video, Laurent explains how to run your ASP.NET apps on Windows or Linux.   Get more information at: http://gslb.ch/265c-onedevquestion  Create your free Azure account today:
